game.name: Inside Darkness
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Inside Darkness is a 2D puzzle-platformer where a young girl must harness the power of light and shadow to transform between human and creature, solve puzzles, and escape a kingdom filled with danger. Explore ancient catacombs, unlock secrets, and master your dual nature in this fantasy adventure.
